camps.name: Hitchcock Center Nature Camp

cost.notes: Tiered pricing $395-$560/week; Chickadee (half-day) $305-$435

camps.description: Nature-based summer camp with sessions for grades K-6 and a Leadership Training program for grades 7-9. Chickadee Camp offers half-day option for youngest campers.

camps.name: Arcadia Nature Camp

cost.notes: Sliding scale pricing based on family income

camps.description: Nature camp at the 734-acre Arcadia Wildlife Sanctuary. Children explore the outdoors, connect with nature, and develop confidence. Max 4 weeks per camper.

camps.name: Safety Village

cost.notes: Financial aid for Northampton/Florence/Leeds residents

camps.description: Day camp for ages 4-6 with two-week sessions. Safe, fun environment for young campers. Financial aid available for Northampton, Florence, and Leeds residents.

camps.name: Camp KidZone

cost.notes: Financial aid for Northampton/Florence/Leeds residents

camps.description: Day camp for students entering grades 1-4 with weekly sessions. Fun activities in a safe environment. Financial aid available for Northampton, Florence, and Leeds residents.

camps.name: Camp Hamp

cost.notes: Financial aid for Northampton/Florence/Leeds residents

camps.description: Day camp for students entering grades 5-6 with weekly sessions. Age-appropriate activities and adventures. Financial aid available for Northampton, Florence, and Leeds residents.

camps.name: Teen Expeditions

cost.notes: Financial aid for Northampton/Florence/Leeds residents

camps.description: Teen expedition program for students entering grades 7-10 with weekly sessions. Outdoor adventures and leadership development. Financial aid available for Northampton, Florence, and Leeds residents.

camps.name: Camp Koala

cost.notes: Full-day $394/week, Half-day $310/week. YMCA member discount available ($320/$243). Sibling discount 5%.

camps.description: Preschool day camp - ideal introduction to summer camp! Theme-based activities including swimming, art, singing, sports, and outdoor play. Children must be fully toilet trained to attend.
camps.notes: Children must be fully toilet trained. Camp info session Feb 1, 11am-12:30pm at YMCA.

camps.name: Camp Prospect

cost.notes: YMCA member rate $260/week. Morning care add-on $43/week ($33 members). Sibling discount 5%.

camps.description: Day camp featuring camp games, physical challenges, swimming, arts and crafts, and sports at various ability levels. Includes Ninja Warrior obstacle course with balance, agility, climbing activities, and an 8-foot Warp Wall. Weekly themes keep activities fresh and engaging.
camps.notes: Features Ninja Warrior obstacle course and Warp Wall. Camp info session Feb 1, 11am-12:30pm at YMCA.

camps.name: Camp Norwich

cost.notes: 2-week sessions $749 ($589 member rate). Final 1-week session $375. Bus transportation additional $140/session. Sibling discount 5%.

camps.description: Classic YMCA camp on beautiful 175-acre Lake Norwich property in the Berkshire foothills. Swimming, boating, archery, fishing, arts & crafts, performing arts, nature study, team activities, outdoor cooking, and low ropes course. Age groups: Explorers (K-2), Adventurers (3-5), Trailblazers (6-8). 139 years of quality programming.
camps.notes: Bus transportation available from Northampton, Florence, Hadley, Southampton, and Westhampton ($140/2-week session). Open house May 30, 10am-2pm.

camps.name: Springfield JCC Summer Camp

cost.notes: Flexible scheduling - book from just one week

camps.description: Day camp for grades K-8 plus Leaders-in-Training for grades 9-10. Inclusion camp available. Accepts Seven Hills state assistance vouchers.

camps.name: Camp Massasoit
camps.description: Developmentally appropriate programs balancing skill development and enjoyment. Theme of respect practiced throughout the day. Contact: (413) 748-4020.

camps.name: Boys & Girls Club Summer Day Camp

cost.notes: Youth $55/week + $10 membership fee; Teens FREE + $10 membership

camps.description: Affordable day camp at Henderson, Stalnaker, and Musgrave locations. Scholarships for free/reduced lunch families. Teen camp (13-17) is free.

camps.name: Camp Kee-wanee

cost.notes: $660 for 3 weeks, $1320 for 6 weeks. Free bus transportation included.

camps.description: Nonprofit arts-focused day camp since 1924. Emphasizes creativity, inclusivity, and self-esteem. Sessions: July 6-24 and July 27-Aug 13.

camps.name: Discovery Camp

cost.notes: $200 residents, $210 non-residents. 8-week discount: 1 week free if paid by June 1

camps.description: Day camp for grades K-2. Activities include playground time, swimming, games, and arts & crafts. Daily lunch and morning snack provided.

camps.name: Sizzlers Camp

cost.notes: $200 residents, $210 non-residents. Field trips available ($30 extra). 8-week discount available.

camps.description: Day camp for grades 3-6. Activities include playground time, swimming, games, and arts & crafts. Daily lunch and morning snack provided.

camps.name: Camp Apex

cost.notes: $260 members, $305 non-members. $40 deposit per week at registration.

camps.description: Traditional day camp on 30+ acres. Activities include group games, songs, swimming, obstacle course, gaga ball, and arts & crafts.

camps.name: Gymnastics & Ninja Camp

cost.notes: $260 members, $305 non-members

camps.description: Indoor camp for kids who love to flip, tumble, balance, and swing. Held at Main Street facility in Greenfield.

camps.name: Lil' Flippers Mini Camp

cost.notes: $165 members, $210 non-members. Must be potty trained.

camps.description: Half-day camp for preschoolers ages 3.5-5. Must be potty trained to attend.

camps.name: Holyoke YMCA Summer Program
camps.description: Weekly themed activities with field trips. Kids learn responsibility, teamwork, and problem-solving. Contact: 413-534-5631.

camps.name: Boys & Girls Club Summer Fun
camps.description: Activities include LEGO, sports, STEM, arts & crafts, bounce houses, spray park, and library visits. Contact Abigail at 413-206-4108.

camps.name: Brains & Motion STEM Camp

cost.notes: $475-$595 depending on program. Robotics, coding, Minecraft, engineering courses available.

camps.description: STEM camps at UMass featuring robotics, coding, Minecraft, and engineering. Courses for grades 2-8 with hands-on projects and outdoor activities.

camps.name: Nike Basketball Camp

cost.notes: Group discounts: $25 off for 5+, $40 off for 10+

camps.description: Complete Skills and Elite basketball camps for boys ages 8-18. Led by Amherst College head coach Marlon Sears. Contact: 413-542-2069.

camps.name: Amherst Tennis Camp

cost.notes: Overnight and commuter options available

camps.description: One of the longest-running tennis camps in the US. Directed by coach Todd Doebler. Overnight or commuter options. Contact: 413-542-8559.

camps.name: Common School SummerFun

cost.notes: $475/week full day, $315/week half day. Limited financial aid available.

camps.description: Multiple programs: Down on the Farm (ages 3-4), Forest Adventures (age 5), Ecosystem Exploration (6-7), D&D, Magic the Gathering, STEAM, Clay, and more for ages 8-13.

camps.name: Nike Swim Camp

cost.notes: $691 extended day, $791 overnight. Optional Starts & Turns clinic $150.

camps.description: Competitive swim camp focusing on stroke refinement. Led by Mount Holyoke coach Dave Allen. Recommended for swimmers with experience in all four strokes.

camps.name: Hartsbrook Farm Camp

cost.notes: Scholarship available

camps.description: Farm-based camp with animal chores (feeding goats, collecting eggs), farm crafts like wool work and cheese-making. Sprouts program for Pre-K to 1st grade.

camps.name: Hartsbrook Creativity Camp
camps.description: Weekly themed artmaking with open-ended creative expression. Each week has unique themed focus with showcase for families at end.

camps.name: Hartsbrook Fiddle Camp
camps.description: Traditional fiddle instruction by ear from Ireland, Scotland, Louisiana, and Appalachia. Welcomes multiple string instruments.

camps.name: Hartsbrook Cooking & Baking Camp
camps.description: Children prepare simple, nourishing foods alongside crafts and writing projects.

camps.name: Roots Vacation Camps

cost.notes: $325 ages 7-12, $360 ages 5-6. 10% sibling discount. Also has Westfield location.

camps.description: Full-day camp with swimming, gymnastics, soccer, turf sports, water slide, trampoline, and crafts. CIT program for ages 13-15.

camps.name: Adventure Zone

cost.notes: Affordable childcare option for working parents

camps.description: Full-day camp with arts & crafts, sports, field trips, weekly swimming at Agawam State Pool, spray parks, and environmental activities. Contact: 413-572-6263.

camps.name: Kamp for Kids
camps.description: Fully inclusive summer camp serving children and young adults ages 3-22, with and without disabilities. Contact Anne Benoit at 413-562-5678.

camps.name: Camp Howe

cost.notes: Day camp $450/week. Sleepaway: Juniors $695, Teens $725, Echo $1000. Two-week options available.

camps.description: Day and overnight camp with Echo program for youth with disabilities. About 140 campers per session. CIT program available. Contact: 413-549-3969.

camps.name: Pioneer Athletic Center Camps
camps.description: Gymnastics and Ninja camps with themed weeks (Unicorn & Slime, Swiftie Week, Ninja Warrior). Rotating activities include gymnastics, ninja obstacles, and activity room.

camps.name: Pioneer Gymnastics Camp
camps.description: Premier gymnastics program since 1966. Offers dance, gymnastics, and taekwondo. Low student-to-teacher ratio with certified instructors. Contact: 413-525-1291.

camps.name: Western MA Pioneers Soccer Camp

cost.notes: 30% off for Western United Pioneers players and Gremio Lusitano members

camps.description: Soccer camps for ages 5-12 (full day and half day) plus high school programs. Full day includes morning training and afternoon activities/scrimmages.

camps.name: Nike Girls Lacrosse Camp

cost.notes: Extended overnight sessions available

camps.description: Intensive lacrosse training led by Nike Camp Director Stacey Freda. Moving to Smith College in 2026. Join priority list for updates.

camps.name: Bonnie Castle Riding Camp

cost.notes: $3,950 per 2-week session + $700 horse boarding. Intermediate/advanced riders only.

camps.description: Overnight equestrian camp for intermediate/advanced riders. Ride twice daily (flat + jumping). 30+ years running. Hunters, jumpers, dressage, combined training.

camps.name: Academy of Music Youth Productions

cost.notes: Year-round productions, not summer camp format

camps.description: Theater productions for ages 6-17 with rehearsals twice weekly. 2026: Frozen Jr (ages 9-16), Legally Blonde Jr (12-17), My Friend Pinocchio (6-10). Contact: education@aomtheatre.com.

camps.name: Fun in the Sun: Early Adventures

cost.notes: 2026 rates not posted yet. 2025 rate was $280/week; extended day was $30/week. Seven Hills vouchers accepted.

camps.description: Town-run day camp (Fun in the Sun) for younger kids. Activities include games, crafts, and outdoor play at Amherst Regional Middle School.

camps.name: Fun in the Sun: Epic Explorers

cost.notes: 2026 rates not posted yet. 2025 rate was $250/week; extended day was $30/week. Seven Hills vouchers accepted.

camps.description: Town-run day camp (Fun in the Sun) for older kids. Activities include sports, games, crafts, outdoor play, and themed weeks at Amherst Regional Middle School.

camps.name: Camp Nonotuck

cost.notes: 2026 rates not posted yet. 2025 was $200/week (Regular) or $225/week (Extended Day). Scholarships available.

camps.description: Weekly day camp at Nonotuck Park with Junior and Senior groups. Activities include outdoor play, games, crafts, and field trips.

camps.name: Summer D.A.Y.S. Program

cost.notes: 2026 rates not posted yet. 2025 was $150/week residents, $160/week non-residents.

camps.description: Town recreation program for grades 1-7 with themed activities and field trips.

camps.name: OPEE Summer Adventures

cost.notes: 2026 rates not posted yet. Check registration portal for pricing.

camps.description: City-run summer day program. Registration and details in Chicopee Parks & Recreation portal.

camps.name: Springfield Parks & Recreation Summer Programs

cost.notes: Summer 2026 details expected mid-April 2026.

camps.description: City-run summer programming. Check Springfield Parks & Recreation for Summer 2026 release.

camps.name: Tiny Tots (Centrum)

cost.notes: 2026 rates not posted. 2025 was $130/week residents, $185/week non-residents. Breakfast and lunch included.

camps.description: Town camp for ages 4-5 with crafts, science, nature, sports, swimming, and field trips.

camps.name: Centrum Playground

cost.notes: 2026 rates not posted. 2025 was $130/week residents, $185/week non-residents. Breakfast and lunch included.

camps.description: Town day camp for ages 6-12 with arts & crafts, science, nature, sports, swimming, and field trips.

camps.name: Centrum S.T.E.P. (Teen Camp)

cost.notes: 2026 rates not posted. 2025 was $130/week residents, $185/week non-residents.

camps.description: Teen summer program with swimming, field trips, and leadership development.

camps.name: Camp Weber

cost.notes: 2025 was $245/session (members), $280 (non-members) + $15 maintenance fee. $50 deposit required. Transportation fee $90 if needed.

camps.description: YMCA day camp on wooded property with swimming and outdoor activities. Bus transportation available.

camps.name: Stony Brook Acres

cost.notes: 2025 was $245/session (members), $280 (non-members) + $15 maintenance fee. $50 deposit required.

camps.description: Outdoor YMCA day camp in Wilbraham with swimming, sports, nature, archery, and arts & crafts.

camps.name: Fun City Summer Day Program

cost.notes: 2025 was $245/session (members), $280 (non-members) + $15 maintenance fee. $50 deposit required.

camps.description: YMCA summer day program at Downtown Springfield Learning Center with indoor and outdoor activities.

camps.name: Small Fry Summer Day Program

cost.notes: 2025 was $245/session (members), $280 (non-members) + $15 maintenance fee. $50 deposit required.

camps.description: YMCA program for 5-year-olds entering kindergarten. Must be toilet trained. Includes games, science, sports, and arts & crafts.

camps.name: YMCA Teen Camp

cost.notes: 2025 was $120/session (members and non-members) + deposit/maintenance fees.

camps.description: Teen program with camp activities, field trips, and leadership development at Camp Weber and Stony Brook Acres.

camps.name: Camp Shepard Day Camp

cost.notes: $75 non-refundable deposit per session required. Balance due one week before each session.

camps.description: Outdoor YMCA day camp on 155+ acres of woodlands in Westfield.

camps.name: Montague Summer Camp

cost.notes: Registration typically opens in March for residents. Check site for 2026 details.

camps.description: Town-run summer camp for elementary-age kids.

camps.name: Montessori School of Northampton Summer Programs

cost.notes: Various programs available. Contact for 2026 pricing.

camps.description: Montessori-inspired summer programs for ages 18 months to 14 years. Theme-based sessions include LEGO Engineering, art classes, camping & foraging. Toddler, Preschool, Elementary, and Middle School tracks available.

camps.name: Cushman Scott Summer Program

cost.notes: Flexible enrollment - minimum 3 days/week

camps.description: Five-week summer program for children 15 months to 5.9 years. Features outdoor time, daily water play, trips to the woods, and rest time after lunch. Flexible scheduling with minimum 3 days/week.

camps.name: Children's Ballet & Movement Summer Camp

cost.notes: Payment plans available. No refunds policy.

camps.description: Dance camp offering a variety of styles in a nurturing environment. Students learn fundamentals of movement including ballet and creative dance. Monthly payment plans available upon request.

camps.name: Bement Day Camp

cost.notes: Includes lunch. $50 off per session if paid by March 2. Register 6 weeks get 7th free.

camps.description: Day camp on beautiful 30-acre campus for grades K-9. Jr Day Camp for K-3, Day Camp for grades 4-9. Activities include swimming, sports, arts, and outdoor adventures. Nut-free lunch included.

camps.name: Bement Enrichment Camps

cost.notes: CIT Camp $500, PE Games $350, Visual Arts $500, Mountain Biking $1000

camps.description: Specialty camps including CIT training (CPR/First Aid certification), PE Games, Visual Arts, Band Camp, and Mountain Biking. Various age ranges by program.

camps.name: Hilltown Sleddogs Summer Camp

cost.notes: Day and overnight options. Contact for 2026 pricing.

camps.description: Unique sled dog camp! Kids choose an Alaskan Husky for the week and learn to care for and train sled dogs. Activities include mushing, scootering, biking with dogs, swimming. Overnight camp includes wilderness skills and campfire activities.

camps.name: Forest Park Zoo Camp

cost.notes: Contact zoo for 2026 pricing

camps.description: Zoo camp for ages 6-13 to explore nature, discover wildlife and meet exotic creatures. Educational programs at the Zoo in Forest Park, a 735-acre woodland park.

camps.name: Stoneleigh-Burnham Horsemanship Camp

cost.notes: Contact school for 2026 pricing

camps.description: Coed horsemanship day camp for beginner riders ages 9-12. Learn grooming, handling, tacking, feeding and beginner riding skills on beautiful 100-acre campus.

camps.name: Stoneleigh-Burnham Sports Camp

cost.notes: Contact school for 2026 pricing

camps.description: Coed sports camp with swimming in outdoor pool, soccer, basketball, handball, plus indoor and outdoor games. Perfect for active campers who enjoy variety.

camps.name: Camp Wilder Adventure Camps

cost.notes: Contact for 2026 pricing

camps.description: Adventure day camps in Southampton with outdoor activities and nature exploration.

camps.name: Springfield Museums Camp

cost.notes: Contact for 2026 pricing

camps.description: Summer camps at the Springfield Museums complex featuring art, science, and history activities. Home to the Dr. Seuss Museum and other world-class exhibits.

camps.name: Stony Brook Acres Camp

cost.notes: Contact for 2026 pricing

camps.description: Day camp in Wilbraham offering outdoor activities and summer fun.

camps.name: Miss Leticia Music Camp

cost.notes: Songwriting week for ages 11+

camps.description: Music-focused summer camp offering instrument lessons, songwriting, and creative musical exploration for young musicians.
camps.notes: Songwriting week requires age 11+. Other weeks for ages 6+.
